competitors.name: Oracle NetSuite

context: As of 2024, SPS Commerce holds 30-35% market share in retail EDI cloud services with 115,000+ customers. August 2024 acquired SupplyPike for $206M. Competition segmented: mid-market (TrueCommerce, Cleo), enterprise (Boomi, MuleSoft), SMB (regional managed EDI).
